text:
@ANCA_DC @UN @StateDept @unfoundation @ArmeniaUN United Nations: #Azerbaijan just bombed a PPE mask factory in #Armenia's Tavush region - putting innocent lives at risk of COVID-19 and raising the risk of a regional war amid this global pandemic.

Demand that Baku respect the @UN's call for a worldwide cease-fire.
